actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to preserve and protect the free choice of individual employees to form, join, or assist labor organizations, to refrain from such activities.

summary.text: Amends the National Labor Relations Act and the Railway Labor Act to repeal provisions allowing an employer and a labor organization to enter into an agreement to require membership in such organization as a condition of employment.

titles.title: A bill to preserve and protect the free choice of individual employees to form, join, or assist labor organizations, to refrain from such activities.
